Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 ([[/r 1d4 + 2]]) piercing damage.

Ram.name: Ram
Ram.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

Cannons.name: Cannons
Cannons.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/80 ft., one target. Hit: 5 ([[/r 1d6 + 2]]) bludgeoning damage.

Amphibious.name: Amphibious
Amphibious.description: The mimic can breathe air and water.

Broadside.name: Broadside
Broadside.description: If the mimic has moved less than half its speed on its turn, it can make an attack with its cannons as a bonus action. When it does so, its speed is reduced to 0 feet for the remainder of the turn.

Ramming Charge.name: Ramming Charge
Ramming Charge.description: If the mimic moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target then immediately hits it with a Ram attack, it has advantage on the attack roll and the target takes an extra 5 ([[/r 2d4]]) bludgeoning damage on a hit. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked @condition[prone].
